SERVICE.TITLE: 1. Service Description
SERVICE.DESCRIPTION: Our platform allows organizers to create custom events, and attendees to discover and register for those events, making payments if required.

ORGANIZER.TITLE: 2. Organizer Responsibility
ORGANIZER.DESCRIPTION: The organizer is responsible for the eventâ€™s content, terms, and fulfillment. Once at least one attendee has registered, the event cannot be deleted under any circumstance.

ATTENDEE.TITLE: 3. Attendee Responsibility
ATTENDEE.DESCRIPTION: Attendees may register for available events. For paid events, once payment is completed, cancellation and refunds are not allowed through the platform.

PAYMENTS.TITLE: 4. Payments and Fees
PAYMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Payments are processed through our secure provider. The platform may charge a transaction fee, shown before confirming the payment.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: 5. Event Changes
MODIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Organizers can modify certain event details (such as date or description), as long as they do not affect essential conditions agreed upon by already registered attendees.

ACCEPTANCE.TITLE: 6. Acceptance
ACCEPTANCE.DESCRIPTION: By using this platform, both organizers and attendees agree to these terms. It is recommended to read them carefully before creating or joining an event.

EVENT.IMPORTANT_INFO_TEXT: It is recommended to arrive 15 minutes early. Remember to bring your ID for accreditation. The event will start promptly at the indicated time.

DIALOG.TITLE: Delete event

QUESTIONS.FAQ_QUESTION_1: How can I register for an event?
QUESTIONS.FAQ_ANSWER_1: To register, just click on the desired event and use the 'Register' button. You will need to be logged in as an assistant user.
QUESTIONS.FAQ_QUESTION_2: Is there a cost to attend events?
QUESTIONS.FAQ_ANSWER_2: Most events are free, but some may have a cost. You will see the price clearly displayed on the event page.
QUESTIONS.FAQ_QUESTION_3: Can I organize my own event?
QUESTIONS.FAQ_ANSWER_3: Yes! After logging in, go to your profile and you will find the option to create and manage your events.
QUESTIONS.FAQ_QUESTION_4: Where can I see events I've registered for?
QUESTIONS.FAQ_ANSWER_4: You can find them in your profile, under the section 'My Events'.
QUESTIONS.CONTACT_ISSUE_BODY: If you're experiencing any issues or have questions, feel free to contact us at soporte@eventos.com or call us at +34 912 345 678.
